Jeetandra, Ekata Shobha da kuma Tusshar Kapoor sun tuna kasaita ciki
Jarumin Tusshar fina-finai Kapoor a ranar Lahadi ya yada wasu hotuna kuciyarsa cikin kasaita don murnar bikin zagayowar ranara duniya. ta
Jarumin yada ya wasu jerin hotuna da suka kunshi hotunansa yana yaro shi da mahaifinsa Jeetendra da babansa Shobha da kuma kuna kaawarsa Ekta Kapoor da kuma wani na baya-bayannan da ke dauke da dansa. da
A hoton tsohon maras launi, an ga jarumi Jeetendra ya yi tsayuwar daukar hoto yana rike dan jariri Tusshar da Ekta hannunsa. a
Ana ganin iya matar Jeetendra a tsaye kusa da mutanen uku hoton. cikin
A na hoto biyu Tusshar Kappor da dansa Laksshya na tsaye cikin fara'a da annashuwa Kamara. kallon
A da rubutun ya saka a jikin hoton da ya yada, ya rubuta "Ina taya ku murnar zagayowar ranar iyaye" da
Tusshar yana Kapoor zaune da 'ya'yansa uwa. ba
An Lakshiya haifi ne ta hanyar daukar cikinta a wajen mahaifa 2016. shakarar
Wadansu jarimin lokutan na yada hotunan da bidiyon karamin dan na sa a shafukan sada Instagram. na
A aiki bangaren kuwa, ganin karshe da aka yiwa Tusshar Kapoor shine Phategi. Sabki
Ana ran sa sake ganinsa ne a fim din 'Laxmmi Bomb' wanda Raghava Lawarence ya umarni. da
A fin cikin din da akwai kuma Akshay Kumar Advani. Kiara
A bangaren daya kuma Ekita Kapoor ya shirya wasu shirya-shiryen Talbijin da kuma Fim kamar su Dream Girl da Hum Paanch da Dolly Kitty aur Chamakte Sitare, da Ye Hai Mohabbatein, da Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii da kuma sauransu. da
An gada gina ta farko a aikin jirgi mai tafiya a kasrkashin kasa na Delhi a kashin 4 na
Aikin jirgi gina mai tafiya a karkashin kasa na birni Delhi ya cimma wani mataki mai muhimmanci yayin da ya shiga wani kashi a aikin-4 yayin da a ka gina gada ta farko a kan mashigar yamma na Janakpurita R K Ashram Marg, A cewar wasu jami'ai Lahadi. ranar
An aikln yi gadar ne a Keshopur a kan wani tudu da ke tsaknin Keshpur da Mukaba Chowks Asabar. daren
"Hukumar Jirgin kula karkashin kasa ta birnin Delhi ta sake samun kai wa ga wani babban mataki na 4 aikin da ta ke yi na fadada layin dogo na karkashin kasa da samun nasarar ginin karfe na wata gada a wata mashiga hanyar jirgin karakashin kasa ta yamma a Janakpuri RK Astta Marg," a cewar wata sanarawa da Hukumar fitar. ta
Wannan nasara "babban da aka samu a wannan aikin ginin layin dogo" an same ta ne duk da karancin ma'aikata da kuma wasu matsalolin jigila da kai-kawo saboda annobar cuta da ake fama da ita, a jami'i. wani
Matsakaicin wannan tsayin gada ta wannan mashiga 10. mita
Sai sauran daia gadojin zasu zama masu tsawon mita 20 a Madhun Chowk (wurin tsallakawa n a 1)da kuma mita 25 a Haderpur Badli Mor a inda wannan layin dogo zai tsallaka wani layin 2. na
A pur Haider, Mor, gadar da za ta dauki layin dogon da zai wuce ta wurin zai kasance mita 28, wanna shine mafi girma a tarihin layin dogo na birni Delhi, sanarwar. cewar
A dai yanzu wuri ma fi tsawo shine wanda ya ke Dhaula Kuan, a inda layin dogo na 7 da ke kan gada ya wuce har 23.6. mita
A kimiyyar tsarin gine-gine ana yin ginshikin gine-gine ne a tsatstsaye domin su tallafin nauyin ginin da ke zama kamar gada a kan ginshikan biyu na gefe. da
Wadannan suka su zama kamar ginshikan da suka tallafi tudun da aka dora layin dogon mai kai. a
Gadojin a da ka dora layin dogo na jirgin karkashi kasa da dora su a tsakiyar hanyoyin mota a birnin Delhi ta kan su ne aka giggina mashigar kasa. karkshin
Yawanci gadojin wadannan sun sa sun zama fittatun kuma ababen kwantace a wajen bayar da adireshi Delhi. birnin
Mashigar dogo layin ta Janakpurin yamma - RK Ahsram ita ce ma fi tsawo da tsawon kilomita 28.92, ita ce karin layin dogo na MAgenta za ta kuma 22. tashohi
Yayin kilolmita da 21.18 na wannan mashigar za a daga shi, yayin da 7.74 kilomita na wannan layi zai kasance kasa. karkashin
An aikin soma ginin wannan sashi a watan Disambar shekarar wuce. ta
A 17 ranar ga watan Yuli, a ka soma aikin ginin sashen karkashin kasa na mashigar wanda aka fara da gina bangon D a tashar jirgin karkashin kasa na Krishna. shakatawar
A 24 ranar ga watan Yuli, Hukumar ta DMRC ta soma kakkafa karafunan zuba kankaren durakai da kuma ginshikai don daga layin dogon wannan bangare na dogon. layin
A wanna karkashin rukunin aiki na 4, kilomita 61. 679 na sabbin layukan dogo za a giggina a kan mashigai daban-daban guda uku da za su kunsh tasoshi 45 na kasa. kakshin
Wannan sashi sabon zai samar da wata babbar mahada a tsakanin shiyoyin daban-daban na jiragen karkashin kasa na Delhi. na
A wannan cikin adadi, Kilomita 22.35 duk za su kasance a karkashin kasa ne yayin da sauran za su kasance gadoji. kan
Fiye cutar da Koronabirus dubu 13.85 ne a Indiya har zuwa yanzu, mutane 32,063 suka mutu, kashi 63.91% warke suka
Adadin 8,85,577 mutane ne suka warke kuma adadin kaso da suka warke ya kai kashi dari. cikin
Garin Delhi: New Indiya ta ba da rahoton wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar ta coronabirus 48,661 a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, suna ɗaukar jimillar zuwa 13,85,522, kamar yadda bayanan nuna. sun
Adadin suka wadanda mutu ya haura 32,063, a inda mutane 705 suka mutu a cikin awanni 24 gabata. suka
Adadin suka wadanda kamu da kwayar cutar coronabirus ya ninka sau biyu a kusan makonni uku tun daga ranar 2 ga watan Yulin, a lokacin da kasar ta tsallake matakin shida. dari
Yawan na adadi wadanda suka kamu da cutar Covid-19 na kasar ya kai makin dubu dari a ranar Juma'ar gabata. ta
Tun wannan daga lokacin, an sami rahoton sabbin kamuwa da ya kai dubu uku. Wannan ita ce rana ta huɗu a jere lokacin da masu kamuwa da cutar COVID-19 suka ƙaru da 45,000. da
Maharashtra ranar a Asabar ta ba da rahoton sabbin kamuwa da cutar 9,251 wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta COVID-19, inda suka dauki adadin a jihar zuwa 3,66,368 yayin da wadanda suka mutu suka kai 257, ciki har da 116 a yankin Mumbai yakin tsakiyar birni (MMR), zuwa 13,389, in ji Ma'aikatar Kiwon jihar. ta
An adadin sallami marasa lafiya 7,227 a rana, inda aka dauki adadin wadanda suka 2,07,194. zuwa
Kimanin lafiya marasa dubu 8.85 ne suka warke ya zuwa yanzu; darajar farfadowa ya tsaya a kashi 63.91 bisa dari yau. safiyar
Kaso yawan na wadanda suka kamu da cutar - yawan marasa lafiya waɗanda aka gwada aka kuma tabbatar sun kamu da kwayar cutar - shine kashi ɗari. cikin
A wannan farkon makon ne, gwamnati ta ce tana da niyyar saukar da adadin wadanda suka kamu da ƙimar zuwa kashi 100. cikin
Jihar a Karnataka ranar Asabar ya yi rajistar a sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar ta Koronavirus 5,000 a rana ta uku a jere, wanda hakan ya kai adadin ya haura daya. baki
A kadai Bengaluru an bayar da rahoton sabbin mutanen da suka kamu da cutar zuwa 2,036 da suka kai jimillar 43,503. zuwa
Matsayin Delhi birnin ya haura a cikin yawan wadanda aka samu da cutar COVID-19 kuma a halin yanzu birnin na matsayi na takwas tsakanin jihohi da yankuna da ke karkashin ikon gwmanatin tarayya a kasar, Babban Ministan Arvind Kejriwal ne ya faɗa Asabar. ranar
A wani cikin karuwar adadi da aka taba samu a rana daya har zuwa yanzu, Kerala a ranar Asabar ta ba da rahoton mutane 1,103 sabbbi da suka kamu da COVID-19, wanada hakan ya daga adadin masu dauke da cutar zuwa 18,098, yayin da sama da dubban mutane 1.5 ake su. da
Kimanin 9,420 mutane ne ke karbar Koronabirus. cutar
Yawan suka wadanda kanu da cutar Coronavirus a Tamil Nadu ya tsallake makin dubu dari tare da sabbin wadanda suka kamuwa da cutar 6,989 da aka rawaito a cikin awanni 24 da suka gabata, wanda kuma shi ne mafi girma a rana guda, kamar yadda bayanan nuna. ya
Mutane da tamanin tara sun mutu kuma 7,758 sun warke a cikin awanni 24 gabata. suka
Yawana wadanda adadin suka kamu a yanzu 2,06,737. kai
Gujarat ranar a Asabar ta shigar da bayanai mafi yawaa rana guda na adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar Koronavirus da 1,081 na sabbin wadanda suka kamu da cutar, wanda hakan ya kai jimlar zuwa 54,712 yayin da marasa lafiya 22 suka mutu, ciki har da aka samu 11 a cikin Surat, a cewar ma'aikatar kiwon jihar. ta
Babban Maharashtra Ministan Uddhav Thackeray zai ƙaddamar da shirin bayar da gudummawar plasma a ranar 27 ga watan Yuli, bayan "Plasma Daan Sankalp Abhiyan" don binciken farko na marasa lafiyar COVID-19 da suka warke a yankin Mumbai. na
Indiya ta ce uku a cikin kasashe masu fama da cutar Koronavirus a duniya bayan Amurka da Brazil, a hankali ta kara karfin gwajin cutar ta COVID-19 kuma ta gudanar da gwaje-gwaje sama da dubu dari 4.2 a cikin yini daya, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Tarayyar ta ce a ranar Asabar, tana mai yaba karuwar tare da danganaa samun wannan nasara ga yawan dakunan gawaje-gwaje samu. aka
Annobar hallaka ta sama da mutane 6,33,000 a fadin duniya tun lokacin da cutar da bayyana a kasar Chima a shekarar da ta wuce, da samun yawan mutane sama da miliyan 15.5 wadanda suka kamu dac cutar, a cewar kamfanin dillancin AFP. na
